column4: Good day to you all, i have a problem installing ubuntu feisty, the live cd could not show the GUI. it shows something like: Ata 1 error and  port failed to respond and it shows a lot of numbers and ?????
i don't know if that's a hardware problem
what is Ata 1 port failed to respond???
an error message
ata is your IDE controler
no the controller probably has
what are you trying to do? and either you tell us full error messages or it's worthless. and use a pastebin
I just did
I asked you a question. answer that first
what hardware do you have? what chipset?
chipset. not cpu
the chips you use on your motherboard
I cannot tell you anymore unless you give me the info I asked
I am not psychic
what chipset? intel, sis, ati, nvidia?
ubuntu.com
i865 chipset with integrated graphics. (asrock mobo)
ubuntu should install fine on it
sounds like hardware. does another OS work fine on the disk? either bad disk controller or bad harddisk possibly
what ubuntu version? maybe try anbother version
and paste the exact and full error message
then write it down when you are actually there
I dunno if you can with the installer, but you can always change that after install: simply edit your fstab
simply a single small file edit
